Text: I cant seem to watch it on the television cause it cant recognize the file type. what do i do? thanks. :)
watch it on something else. problem solved.

@anasitobayagito: here is what I do to watch these files on my tv. 1: dl into video folder. 2: set plex media server to access video folder. 3: use plex app. 4: enjoy. (I have plex on logitec revue and roku) Good luck!
